summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Criminal Code (Ordinance 102843), amending Sections 12A.12.150 "Lewd Conduct," 12A.16.020 "Disorderly Conduct," 12A.17.140 "Unlawful Use of Weapons," 12A.17.160 "Exemptions," 12A.20.020 "Obstructing a Public Officer," 12A.20.110 "False Reporting," 12A.46.100 "Discharging Firearm or Explosive - Exceptions," 12A.46.120 "Failure to Appear in Reponse to Citation," and adding new Sections 12A.12.160 "Urinating in Public," and 12A.20.010 "Resisting Arrest."
